meanings.definition: A substance derived from collagen, used in making jelly and other products.
meanings.sent1: The gelatines in the jelly give it a wobbly texture.
meanings.sent2: I love eating fruit salad with gelatines mixed in.
meanings.sent3: The gelatines decided to have a dance party in the fridge.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as firm as gelatines, never wavering.
meanings.sent5: The chef carefully measured the gelatines to ensure the dessert set perfectly.

meanings.definition: A dessert made with gelatin, sugar, and fruit juice.
meanings.sent1: The colorful gelatines were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: My grandma always makes delicious gelatines for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The gelatines giggled as they jiggled on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The gelatines shimmered like jewels under the light.
meanings.sent5: The children couldn't resist the wiggly allure of the gelatines.
